MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 3:36PM in the CW5 postcode areas of Nantwich following reports of grounded overhead line caused by a fallen tree. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:58PM on 21st January 2021
